summary: Build a website for SGS Solutions, a computer sales and service company.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern minimalist logo for “SGS Solutions” in a tech/service style (sgs-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero illustration showing computer repair/sales theme, clean vector style (sgs-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 4 simple line icons representing service offerings (sgs-service-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page company website for “SGS Solutions” (computer sales and service) with clear navigation and polished marketing content in English.

Implement core pages and sections suitable for a computer sales & service company: Home, Products, Services, About, and Contact pages. Home should include a hero section, value propositions, featured offerings, and a call-to-action to Contact.
Add a Contact form UI with validation (name, email, phone optional, subject, message) and submit success/error states.
Add a simple authenticated “Inbox” page in the frontend to view stored contact submissions (read-only). Access should require Internet Identity login.
Define and apply one coherent visual theme for SGS Solutions across the entire site (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a professional “computer services” feel (avoid blue & purple).
Add basic SEO and accessibility essentials: meaningful page titles/meta descriptions per page, semantic headings, keyboard navigability, and accessible form labels/errors.

Generate and include static brand images and illustrations for SGS Solutions (logo + simple marketing visuals), store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them in the UI (e.g., header logo and Home hero).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a company website for SGS Solutions (computer sales and service)

Create backend support to store contact form submissions in the canister, and expose methods to create and list submissions (listing should be restricted to authenticated users via Internet Identity).
